Отправить Резюме

Senior Front-End Developer

Описание
  • Support the development and execution of all Company’s initiatives and strategies in the region.
  • Build and manage relationships with local and international client facing, marketing, middle and back office teams to ensure success of Company’s projects and strategies.
  • Assist in localizing website and KYC standards that complies with international regulations and ethical standards of the company.
  • Anticipate client’s needs and propose alternative business solutions in a timely manner.
  • Assist in growing the company’s affiliate and introducing broker business.
  • Continually capitalizes upon opportunities to increase client satisfaction and strengthen relationships.
  • Provide exceptional support to existing client base including platform usage, market commentary and product education.
Требоваания
  • Degree in Economics / Finance / Business Administration preferred
  • Fluent in spoken and written English and Malay Bahasa is a must. Other Language skills will be a plus.
  • Good MS office skills and familiarity of Salesforce software preferred.
  • Fresh Graduate / No experience in Finance Industry will be considered, formal training will be provided.
  • Candidate should be eligible to work in HK. WORKING VISA, DEPENDENT VISA, and IANG Visa holders are welcomed.
